alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 9:26PM CDT until April 09 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Neches River Near Town Bluff Mermentau River Near Mermentau Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins along the bayou with a few structures right along the bayou threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Friday was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 16.0 Fri 8 pm CDT 17.6 15.0 11.2 &&
